paper.title: Feel the Difference: A Guide with Attitude!

author.org: School of Mathematical and Computer Sciences, Heriot Watt University, Edinburgh, EH14 4AS, Scotland#TAB#
School of Mathematical and Computer Sciences, Heriot Watt University, Edinburgh, EH14 4AS, Scotland#TAB#

paper.abstract: This paper describes a mobile context-aware `intelligent affective guide with attitudeu0027 that guides visitors touring an outdoor attraction. Its behaviour is regulated by a biologically inspired architecture of emotion, allowing it to adapt to the useru0027s needs and feelings. In addition to giving an illusion of life, the guide emulates a real guideu0027s behaviour by presenting stories based on the useru0027s interests, its own interests, its belief and its current memory activation. A brief description of the system focusing on the core element - the guideu0027s emotional architecture - is given followed by findings from an evaluation with real users.
